content: yolanda socks yolanda socks are knitted cuff down on a long circular needle the stitch pattern is easy to memorize so this makes a perfect knitting project to work on while listening to your favorite podcast or watching a tv-show this sock design is the result of a collaboration between laurelknits and wollplatz de with lost yarn shipments planning and shifting the deadlines yet again yolanda sock design was finally finished and published just in time for christmas 2021 we hope you enjoy knitting yolanda socks and share your beautiful creations with us over on instagram using the
